page.title: 10THE FIRE STATION
page.content: The Market Deeping Fire Station was built in approximately 1974.It employs 13 part-time firemen and they deal with 70 to 80 calls a year,mostly house fires.The worst fire they have attended was the one at Baston House, Fen Road.The Fire station has one fire engine called the watertender.The uniform that they have to wear is big and bulky and hot, especially in the summer. The trousers and boots melt in any fire if they are in there too long.Most of the firemen like their job as a firemen because they find it an interesting and rewarding job.The firemen meet once a week to check the equipment and to have a fire practice. The Fire Station is centrally situated near the Police Station,Health Centre and Library.
